content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana the case involves the division of assets between two exspouses the total value of the assets is 165000 eur including a property equipment mortgage loan debt housing loan debt and a car the assets will be split equally between the plaintiff and the defendant the decision is based on the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the court settlement is confidential and there is no translation available for the document
